participant_1.background:
I keep a journal of my memories to help me remember how I used to feel when I was younger.
I am a 25 year old male who is concerned about his health and weight.
I like to spend time on websites about pens and lobster.
my dad and i own over 600 movies.
I like to pamper myself.

participant_2.background:
I stayed in and ordered a pizza, even though I had promised myself I would eat healthier.
i am almost 7 feet tall.
I can't do a lot of things that other people can do because I'm in a wheelchair, but I try to stay positive and make the best of my situation.
I'm passionate about writing because it allows me to express my thoughts and feelings in a way that I can't otherwise.
i wish i had money to travel.

content.text: I'm good, thanks! How are you?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking!
That's good to hear! I just got home from work and I'm looking forward to a relaxing evening.
That's nice! I'm actually in the middle of writing a story.
Oh, that's interesting! What kind of story are you writing?
It's a fantasy story about a young woman who discovers that she has magical powers.
That sounds really cool! I love fantasy stories.
Thanks! I'm glad you like it.
So, what do you do for fun?
I like to read, write, and play video games.
Those are all great hobbies! I like to read and play video games too.
What kind of books do you like to read?
I like to read fantasy, science fiction, and mystery novels.
Those are all great genres! I love reading fantasy novels too.
Me too! They're so fun to read.
